solution_line_template: There are a total of {group1_students} + {group2_students} + {group3_students} = <<{group1_students}+{group2_students}+{group3_students}={total_kindergartners}>>{total_kindergartners} kindergartners.
Altogether, they bring a total of {total_kindergartners} x {tissues_per_box} = <<{total_kindergartners}*{tissues_per_box}={total_tissues}>>{total_tissues} tissues.
